vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κοιτ-άζω,
(κοίτη) put to bed, [Refs 5th c.AD+]; especially of cattle, fold, ποιμένων κοιταζόντων πρόβατα [LXX]; cause to rest, ποῦ ποιμαίνεις, ποῦ -άζεις ἐν μεσημβρί;[LXX]
__2 middle, Doric dialect aorist ἐκοιταξάμην, go to bed, sleep, ἀνὰ βωμῷ θεᾶς κοιτάξατο νύκτα [LXX+5th c.BC+]
__2.b encamp, bivouac, Aen. Tact.[Refs 2nd c.BC+]; perhaps to be read in [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II intransitive, in active, have a lair, of a lion, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: nest, of birds, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__III parcelout lands (compare κοίτη see), [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
